lead_paragraph: Carolina released quarterback David Carr and signed receiver Muhsin Muhammad to a two-year contract.Carr signed a two-year, $6 million deal with the Panthers last year after five years as a starter in Houston. Muhammad was released by the Chicago Bears last week.
